alert.note: Alert for Coastal Volusia; Inland Volusia (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 23 at 8:57PM EST by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Patchy Dense Fog Developing Across Volusia County This Evening... Surface observations and traffic cameras were showing areas of fog, with localized visibilities as low as one half mile in spots across portions of Volusia County. Motorists should use caution on roadways this evening into the overnight and be alert for rapidly changing visibilities, especially along Interstate 95 and further westward across the county. The fog will continue to create hazardous driving conditions this evening and into the overnight. Drivers should prepare to encounter rapid reductions in visibility from locally dense fog on their evening commute. When driving in dense fog, reduce your speed, use only your low beam headlights, and leave extra following distance between your vehicle and the one in front of you.
